description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 1.30 of Section 73 Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme to make minor amendments and remove existing definitions within the Glossary to Conditions of the s73 decision notice in association with Section 96A NMA application (LPA ref: 22/1034/NMA). Amendments comprise the following: deletion of Glossary definition for "Child Care Facilities (Eastern Lands Zone)", "Child Care Facilities (Brent Terrace Zone)" and "Child Care Facilities (Station Quarter Zone)"; amendments to Glossary definitions for "Community Facilities (Eastern Lands Zone)", "Community Facilities (Market Quarter Zone)", "Occupation Finish Standard", "Phase 1C", "Phase 5C", "Phase 6B"
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area North West London
